participant_abstract.sent: The final prototype was presented by the designers and then evaluated as a team, lead by the Market Researcher.
The final production costs were calculated and presented in a spread sheet by the Project Manager.

participant_actions.sent: To consider the marketing, advertising and distribution of the product and to monitor its success in the market place.

participant_decisions.sent: It was calculated that the final production cost of the remote control was 12.20 euros, which is within the original budget of 12.50 euros.
The overall satisfaction with the product was high (an average of 1.9 on the satisfaction scale devised by the Market Researcher).

participant_problems.sent: Continuing corporate identity (i.e. colour schemes and logo) presented problems for the overall aesthetics of the product.
